citations.narrative:
At the time of the inspection, there were large numbers of house-type flies noted in one portion of the indoor swine
housing facility. The flies were observed on the bodies of many of the pigs housed in this portion of the facility as well as
on the walls and floors of the affected enclosures.
Per this Section, a safe and effective program for the control of insects, ectoparasites, and pests shall be established and
maintained. Although the Licensee has a pest control program in place that utilizes several different modalities, the
measures in place were not effectively controlling and reducing the number of flies based on the number of flies seen on
the animals and in the enclosures. Correct by 7/10/23.
This inspection and exit briefing were conducted with facility representatives.
*END OF REPORT*
n

narrative:
3.131(d) 
   
Sanitation. 
At the time of the inspection, there were large numbers of house-type flies noted in one portion of the indoor swine 
housing facility. The flies were observed on the bodies of many of the pigs housed in this portion of the facility as well as 
on the walls and floors of the affected enclosures.  
 
Per this Section, a safe and effective program for the control of insects, ectoparasites, and pests shall be established and 
maintained. Although the Licensee has a pest control program in place that utilizes several different modalities, the 
measures in place were not effectively controlling and reducing the number of flies based on the number of flies seen on 
the animals and in the enclosures. Correct by 7/10/23. 
 
This inspection and exit briefing were conducted with facility representatives.  
 
*END OF REPORT* 
 
 n
